A Field Epidemiologist with more than 7 years of experience in Infectious Diseases Surveillance, and Emergency Response.

My current interests are in Infectious Disease Epidemiology with particular emphasis on Antimicrobial Resistance pathogens, Antimicrobial Stewardship, and Health System Dynamics.
